name: 蕭耀榮
objective:
課程包含模糊控制與灰色系統，培養學生能運用模糊控制與灰色系統之理論於控制系統及車輛系統上，內容包括模糊集合，近似推理理論，解模糊方法，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之應用，.灰色系統，灰預測原理，灰色建模，灰色控制。

This courses will teach fuzzy logic control and gray system (and neural-network if possible).  Students  will know how to apply FLC and Grey in control systems or vehicle systems.  The topics covered in this lecture inculde: fuzzy set, fuzzy reasoning and inference, defuzzyfication, FLC design, FLC applications, grey theory, grey prediction, gray modeling, and grey control.
